title: Rename public branding to Meri KITAAB

requirements.summary: Replace all visible public-site branding text and logo alt text from "Writer's Library" to "Meri KITAAB" in the shared layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Header brand title displays "Meri KITAAB" instead of "Writer's Library".
Footer copyright text displays "Meri KITAAB" instead of "Writer's Library".
The header logo image alt text is updated to "Meri KITAAB".

file_operations.description: Update header brand title text, footer copyright line, and the header logo alt text to use "Meri KITAAB" instead of "Writer's Library" (no image asset changes).

requirements.summary: Update base HTML and React page-level browser tab titles to use "Meri KITAAB" instead of "Writer's Library" on Home, Category, and Writing pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page sets document.title to "Meri KITAAB - Home" (replacing "Writer's Library - Home").
Category page sets document.title to "<Category Title> - Meri KITAAB" (replacing "<Category Title> - Writer's Library").
Writing detail page sets document.title to "<Writing Title> - Meri KITAAB" (replacing "<Writing Title> - Writer's Library").

file_operations.description: Change the base HTML <title> from "Writer's Library" to "Meri KITAAB".
Update the Home page useEffect document.title assignment to "Meri KITAAB - Home".
Update the Category page useEffect document.title template to "${category.title} - Meri KITAAB".
Update the Writing detail page useEffect document.title template to "${writing.title} - Meri KITAAB".
